DOC.brief_summary: Accu-Chek® Insight Insulin Pump EU Study Multicenter Study evaluate Accu-Chek® Insight Insulin Pump routine practice . This open-label , prospective , multinational , multicenter study evaluate CSII therapy Accu-Chek Insight Insulin pump routine practice adult subject Type 1 type 2 diabetes . Subjects must intensive insulin therapy least six month i.e . either CSII MDI . All subject receive train preparation , program daily use Accu-Chek Insight Insulin pump . In addition , subject previously MDI may receive train order comfortable use insulin pump . The study conduct 10-12 site Austria , France United Kingdom . A total 80-95 subject enrol study .
DOC.brief_title: European , Open-label , Prospective , Multinational , Multicenter Study Adult Subjects With Type 1 Type 2 Diabetes Previously MDI CSII Therapy . Subjects Home Setting Considered Routine Practice .
DOC.criteria: Male female least 18 year old Diagnosed least 12 month Type 1 2 Diabetes require insulin therapy Intensive insulin therapy MDI CSII least 6 month Willing self monitor blood glucose 4 time daily Significantly impaired awareness hypoglycemia Unstable chronic disease diabetes Acute illness inability recognize pump signal alarm determine investigator Pregnancy
